name: books_api_dev.md
content:
# REST API feat node, express, postgres

## Overview
- REST API through express.js
- PostgreSQL schema
- data populated from Kaggle (probably books but exact tbd)
- An automatic seeder that transforms CSV into PostgreSQL records
- Bonus task: add authentication

## Endpoints

Should expose at least 2 endpoints
- PUT/POST
- GET

## Areas to research

- REST best practices

- Endpoints
- getAll, getOne, findOne, findMany, createOne etc.
- Postgres
- How to seed the db
- Which implies converting from x to y format via node?
- Node pg driver for interfacing with Postgres
